iterations.yara_rule:
rule Bypass_EscapeSequence
{
    meta:
        description = "Detects bypass points for evasion sequences involving ExitProcess and CRT exit functions"
        cape_options = "bp0=$pattern0+0,action0=skip,bp1=$pattern1+0,action1=skip,bp2=$pattern2+0,action2=skip,count=0"

    strings:
        $pattern0 = { 55 8B EC FF 75 ?? }  // push ebp, mov ebp, push dword [ebp+08h]
        $pattern1 = { FF 75 08 E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? }  // push dword [ebp+08h], call (CRT exit)
        $pattern2 = { 59 FF 15 ?? ?? ?? ?? }  // pop ecx, call (ExitProcess)

    condition:
        any of them
}

new_signature_details.name: static_pe_pdbpath
new_signature_details.description: The PE file contains a PDB path

new_signature_details.name: packer_unknown_pe_section_name
new_signature_details.description: The binary contains an unknown PE section name indicative of packing

new_signature_details.name: packer_entropy
new_signature_details.description: The binary likely contains encrypted or compressed data
